column5: These size 10s aren't wide enough for my foot.  Or for my other foot, either.  Another board member will donate his extra pair of size 11 boot waders to me, because, well, they're extra.  So this is what I gotta do.  I need to give my too small waders away.  They have never been wet, and always hung by the boots in storage.  Send me a pm, pick em up, and they're yours.  Since they're free, they will go to the first at the door.    I hate giving things away for free, but I don't have any choice here.  I also turned out my lights tonight, I feel so dirty.
You're swell douGal ! If they where hip boots I'd come visit ya... mine started leaking last September..
If the rumours I heard are correct DouG,  You should be a size 15?
Awwww, ain't that sweet.  That's some good Ju Ju DouG  Hey, you shaved your head  Joey
(pssst, your holding the reel the wrong way)
Youse guys are funny right there.  I hope to fish with Snag someday, one of my lifetime goals.  Srsly.
yup and he's standing in mud where there isn't a river just the dried up bed... don't think you're gonna get you're first steelie there douG!
I hope you don't think that I would ever post a pic of the best trib ever. Of all time.  That's why it sorta looks like a fake background there, photoshopped in the Margaree.  Mum's the word.
A couple have expressed some interest, I will post again how it works out.

The waders are gone, thanks to those who expressed interest.  This is the way this happened.  I was talking to a board member who offered a spare set of waders.  I thought that I should pay this forward, and offered my waders here.  Dude that picked them up offered a tax receipt for MS.  I splained this to the younger daughter, and she said,"This is craaaaazy!  When does the madness stop?"  Pay it all forward, friends.
